name: Monophobia (itch)
description:
Monophobia is a pixelated horror game, designed based on a story of a man who found himself in a middle of nowhere, trying to get back home.

Find out how you got here by exploring through the woods. This game was made for #LOWREZJAM that was hosted on itch.io. #retro #survival #horror

Also this game has FIVE endings you can get. Try getting them all!

If you want to talk to me and my community go to this discord server: https://discord.gg/NU5ZeE5 if you want to call me in-game (yes there is a telephone in the game where you can dial people in) my number is 2003. See you there!
